title: My account says it was logged in on another computer
body: Is this actually something i should be concerned about or is it just the shitty client acting up again?

replies.body: Wolfess offers some solid advice here.  It's really important to have good security practices, and I suggest going over the[ account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide to help with that.  The notification from the client is telling you that someone has logged into your account elsewhere.  If it's not you, secure your account as soon as possible.  If you have any issues what that, our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide can help with regaining access.  Good luck!

If i had a collection of world's worst comments, i'd add this one to the top 5..
Seriously, the entire comment is just pointless, all you're saying is "wolfess offers solid advice" and "upgrade security or use account recovery guide"

If I were you I'd make sure to change the password and also make sure that the email associated with the account was still the correct one.

If something doesn't seem right, send a support ticket.
yeah, its just the client falling apart
